subject: Sewers and Sewage
Swimming
New York City Triathlon
Triathlon
lead_paragraph: The swimming portion of the New York City Triathlon is one of the few times a New Yorker would voluntarily plunge into the sometimes unsanitary Hudson River.
snippet: The swimming portion of the New York City Triathlon is one of the few times a New Yorker would voluntarily plunge into the sometimes unsanitary Hudson River.
